        Repository Details:
        Repository Name: S-P_500_Stock_Prediction
        Description: Advanced Stock Price Prediction Tool using ARIMA and LSTM models with a Streamlit-based web interface for visualization and analysis.
        Topics: arima, deep-learning, financial-forecasting, lstm, machine-learning, python, stock-price-prediction, streamlit, time-series

  "Jupyter Notebook": 98.8,
  "Python": 1.2
}
        Recent Commit Messages: Update README.md, Add files via upload, More companies, Merge branch 'main' of https://github.com/PhongCT1105/S-P_500_Stock_Prediction, Exclude google analytic for faster rendering

- Developed an advanced stock price prediction tool to address the need for accurate financial forecasting in volatile markets.
- Designed and implemented predictive models using ARIMA and LSTM techniques while creating a user-friendly Streamlit web interface for visualization.
- Integrated time-series analysis and machine learning methodologies to refine prediction accuracy and enhance user interaction through dynamic web features.
- Successfully delivered an innovative solution that improved stock price forecasting effectiveness and facilitated data analysis for end-users, resulting in increased engagement and usability.

- Developed SyntheSearch, an innovative research tool designed to streamline academic literature retrieval and synthesis using artificial intelligence.
- Led the integration of fastapi, GPT-4, and LangChain technologies to create a comprehensive platform capable of delivering precise and insightful summaries of research papers.
- Implemented key features including a user-friendly interface, backend API endpoints for data retrieval, and advanced embedding techniques utilizing a vector database.
- Enhanced researchers' efficiency by significantly reducing the time spent on literature reviews, resulting in an improved understanding of core concepts and increased productivity.
